0.5.5: add checkParam function
0.5.4: slight improvement in the strandard CSS themes.
0.5.3: fixing path module install/develop mode to obtain share directory.
0.5.2: add doc and paths modules
0.5.1: remove useless .coverage and update a test
0.5.0: renamed cnolab.deploy to easydev and remove dependencies over rpy2 (no
  more distribute or multidistribute modules that will be part of rtools instead)
0.4.5: fix bug in setup.py to include the standard themes properly.
0.4.5: fix bug in distribute module. shellcmd does not print error messages. add tests.
0.4.4: fix distribute typos
0.4.3: add new themes

0.4.1:
